amendment.description: To phase out the authority of the Export-Import Bank of the United States and to require the President to initiate negotiations with other major exporting countries to end subsidized export financing programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 2100 proposed by Senator Lee.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2100, under the order of 5/14/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 12 - 86. Record Vote Number: 91.
